data.actual_result: it does not always mark a channel that has unreads and sometimes channels that don't have the dot actually have unread messages
data.expected_result: the unread messages dot actually marks a channel that has unread messages
data.short_description: When using the share screen some channels are marked as having unreads when there's no new message in the channel
data.steps_to_repro: - share something, I used YouTube, images, gifs - once you're in the share screen you should see different channels or DMs/what have you - if you look next to the channel # you'll sometimes see a white Dot indicating there's a new message. - tap that channel and share there - 9/10 times you'll notice there are no new messages. And sometimes channels that don't have a white Dot will actually have unread messages. - I've noticed this happens a lot more frequently when Discord has been minimized and you're sharing from another app.
